sentences.en: A symposium is a meeting or conference for discussion of a topic.
sentences.cn: 讨论会即讨论某一论题的聚会或会议.

sentences.en: Credentials MUST be awarded at an ICOI sponsored symposium.
sentences.cn: 所有证书必须在ICOI总会主办的大会领取.

sentences.en: He had been taking part in an international symposium on population.
sentences.cn: 他那时在参加一个有关人口的国际研讨会。

sentences.en: I want to welcome you all to the Sales Promotion Symposium.
sentences.cn: 我要欢迎大家参加这个促销座谈会.

sentences.en: In this symposium , better is it to on 1 y sit in si 1 ence.
In this symposium, my part is only to sit in silence.
sentences.cn: 在这次讨论会上, 我只要安静的坐着就够了.

sentences.en: Mr. K . L . Chan presented a technical paper at the Symposium.
sentences.cn: 陈家龙 先生于研讨会发表技术论文.

sentences.en: Once I attended an international symposium on Dunhuang studies held at the Mogao Grottoes.
sentences.cn: 我去时,一次敦煌学国际学术讨论会正在莫高窟举行.

sentences.en: Program of the International Symposium on Central Asian Manuscripts , Wenjin Liushang, Vol.17.
sentences.cn: 《西域文献国际学术座谈会手册》,《文津流殇》第17期.

sentences.en: Registration includes access to all sessions, meals and refreshments and symposium materials.
sentences.cn: 报名费包括会议费用, 餐点及茶点和研讨会材料费用.

sentences.en: Several other scientists from abroad may also be attending the symposium.
sentences.cn: 还有几位海外科学家也可能参加此会.

sentences.en: The languages used during the symposium are Mandarin Chinese and Italian.
sentences.cn: 研讨会使用的语言为中文与义文.

sentences.en: The specialists and scholars present at the symposium come from all corners of the country.
sentences.cn: 出席研讨会的专家学者们来自全国各地.

sentences.en: The symposium on AIDS research lasted two days.
sentences.cn: 艾滋病研究的报告会持续了两天.

sentences.en: Warmly welcome you all to the Sales Promotion Symposium.
sentences.cn: 热烈欢迎大家参加这个促销座谈会.

sentences.en: What have you learned from the symposium?
sentences.cn: 你参加了这次科学讨论会,有什么体会?

words.tran_cn: 讨论会，座谈会；专题论文集；酒宴，宴会

trans.tran_cn: 专题讨论会，座谈会，学术报告会，专题论文集，（古希腊）酒宴，宴会
trans.tran_en: a formal meeting in which people who know a lot about a particular subject have discussions about it
